name: Operation Animal Liberation
description:
Fight back against an evil corporation and save innocent lives, but look out for guard drones!

My first solo Unity project from 2017.

Music by Eric Matyas (soundimage.org). Thanks to Sebastian Lague for the stealth tutorial, Rokay3D, Polydactyl and Popup Asylum for some awesome free 3D assets.

Controls:
Move: WASD, hold Shift to sprint
Look: Mouse
